scripts.start: npx --yes wrangler@latest pages dev public --kv=CACHE_KV --binding LOCAL=1 --d1 DB=FAF408E9-3EC3-452D-9265-150BEA4FFF54 --port 2000 --compatibility-date 2023-12-01 --compatibility-flags="nodejs_compat"
scripts.kill: pid=$(lsof -t -i:2000 -c workerd); [ -n "$pid" ] && kill $pid && echo "PID $pid killed" || echo "Nothing to kill"
scripts.list-db-migrations: npx wrangler d1 migrations list swiftace-db --local -c d1.toml
scripts.apply-db-migrations: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply swiftace-db --local -c d1.toml
scripts.query-db: npx wrangler d1 execute swiftace-db --local -c d1.toml --command
